abstract_summ: This hinders the integration of smart contracts running in different blockchains, e.g., into enterprise business processes.This paper introduces the Smart Contract Invocation Protocol (SCIP), which unifies interacting with smart contracts of different blockchains.To draw a roadmap of current research activities of the blockchain community, we first conduct a brief overview of state-of-the-art blockchain surveys published in the recent 5 years.This article describes the impact and revolution of FinTech and Blockchain in the financial industry and demonstrates the main characteristics of such technology.In this paper we propose a true concurrent model of smart contracts execution.
